title: Cozy 1 BR west philly gem with extra space
description:
Cozy 1BR west philly apartment available in late November or December 1st. Located on a quiet street, this first-floor one-bedroom aparment boosts a spacious kitchen, a large rear bedroom with a private deck and ample closet space, and an elongated living room with dozens of feet of built in bookshelves. The front room is a three-sided windowed sun room that gets sun all day. Entry is shared with apartment on second floor.
This apartment is ideal for a couple or single tenant. The front room has been used as an office in the past. Cats are allowed, but no dogs unfortunately (sorry pups!).
Amenities and features include:
+Window AC units installed and removed by landlord
+Ceiling fans in every room
+disposal, full-size oven, and built-in microwave, and new dishwasher
+Regular scheduled pest management
+Washer/dryer in unit (to be installed)
+wired for verizon and comcast
Property owner has lived in this apartment for 8 years, with spouse and now 7 year old [who is very excited to have her own proper bedroom when we move out (^_^)]. We are moving down the street to 50th and Catherine, and this property is the only rental property we own. Snow removal and garden upkeep are managed by the property owner. We are very responsive and really think of this house as a home.
House is on Larchwood, a block with beautiful gardens, young trees, and has a dead-end alley behind filled with families and friendly neighbors. Block parties, fire-pits, and more happen regularly, if you are into that.
Trolley, Bus, and El are all within walking distance, and the Penn Bus stops down the street. Street parking is ample - non-permitted on 49th and permitted on Larchwood.
We'll be making some improvements to the apartment when we move out, including installing a stacked washer and dryer in the kitchen*, replacing the carpets or restoring the hardwood floors, and replacing the kitchen floor.
Photos are of apartment empty in 2014. Up to date photos, live video or in-person tours available by request.
Rent is $1250, including *all utilities* except internet. First month, and security due at signing. Last month due before move-in. Discount on security deposit for multi-year leases or leases that end in July.

title: Newbold spacious home for rent by owner
description:
Newbold- House for rent by owner. 18th & Mckean
Old home with many modern touches. Currently, owner-occupied but moving abroad to my other house. Completely updated. Backyard with lots of growing things like strawberries, blackberries, and figs.
Looking for responsible tenants that will enjoy and take care of my home.
Large house on a main street, not a side street which is hard to find in the area. 2 floors with basement storage. 3 bedrooms: one front master, medium middle, and a back 2-room combo office (or whatever you like to set up) / back bedroom. 1.5 bathrooms, not the largest but updated and clean (new sinks, fixtures, and toilets). A fabulous gourmet kitchen with a crazy island on wheels (currently refinishing the floors will update photo soon), an extra deep sink, quartz countertops, a big fridge with an auto ice maker and filtered water (you're responsible for the cartridges), and a stovetop with a center griddle for lazy Sundays and brunch. Everything is in excellent working order.
Leaving bookcases in every bedroom (I like to read...) and a storage unit/bin for use in the bathroom. They fit perfectly but can be removed upon request.
House also has a new main water line and front porch recently done in concrete. Handyman lives close by in case of emergency, as well as my family that can help with maintenance and any issues.
Live in a great part of South Philly. By Melrose, South Philly Taproom, Second District Brewing, ARS, Lang's fruit & veg, vegan options, not to mention all of East Passyunk a short walk away. Between very convenient public transport.
No laundry in the home bc there is like 4 within walking distance. Closest is a block and a half with drop off service. Window AC units are also not provided, but I will help mount and install them if needed.

-References from previous landlords
-Sorry no pets, I'm allergic in case I ever decide to move back.
-First, last, and security totaling 3 months
rent = $6000
-Steady employment income verified
-Clean
-Smoking only outside
-Year lease with an opportunity to renew for good tenants. See less

title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!

description:
Hello - My parents and I have a few places which will come available on or around 1 OCTOBER. We have a couple of one and two bedroom places, a couple of three bedroom places, a four bedroom place, and a five bedroom place. Some have garages, some don't. If you might be interested and want more details, please send a detailed message (text or email. I don't have my ringer on so I don't generally answer phone calls...) and include a little information about yourself and your potential roommates. I try to only check my messages and answer emails a couple times a day, so feel free to ask any questions you might be curious about and don't fret if it takes me a while to get back to you. Then I can send you more details!
Thanks very much!

title: Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House! Available August 2022
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants.

title: Newly renovated 2 BDRM Apartment with Parking space
description:
This beautiful + newly renovated, spacious two-floor apartment is a perfect spot for someone looking for a centrally located, bright home with lovely views of the beautiful old church across the street. A private entrance leads up the stairs to the main floor with a living room, dining room, open-plan kitchen, and bathroom (with laundry).
The second set of stairs leads to two large bedrooms, each with its own closet.
This unit has brand-new cabinets, flooring and windows, new LED lights (to help reduce your energy bill), baseboard heaters, and brand-new appliances including a stove and refrigerator.
The brand-new stackable washer and dryer unit is in your unit so you do not need to leave your apartment to do laundry! And no charge for using the units either!
The unit can be set up for Comcast or Fios internet wiring (whichever you prefer).
Another big perk is that unit is well above the floodplain so you don't have to worry (like you would about a unit closer to the river) about getting flooded out by a hurricane or large storm if the river level rises.
Also - the unit includes one dedicated parking space in the rear of the building!
PERKS
1. This unit has just been fully renovated so everything is brand new!
2. No extra bills due for the Sewer, Water + Trash fees -- paid by the landlord.
3. This unit will come with two new Energy-Star window A/C units (which are included for use in the unit during the hot summer months!
You are responsible for gas heat, electricity and your cable/FIOS.
NOTE → Certain small pets may be allowed for an additional non-refundable pet deposit (equal to 1-month rent).
Smoke-free building.
Must have good references and pass a credit check.
To move in, you must pay 1st month's rent and 1 and a half month security deposit.
NOTE: We do not accept Section 8.
WHY BRIDGEPORT?
Bridgeport is an ideal location because you are 8 minutes from the King of Prussia Mall, have 2 stops to choose from for the high-speed rail line and are minutes from the Norristown transit center with the regional rail to Center City and buses available to go directly to NYC. Plus you have access to the bike path (with a plan to run the bike path extension directly through Bridgeport soon) along with great restaurants such as Taphouse 23, Bridgeport BrewPub, Frosty Falls, Franzone's Pizza, Dino's and more. There's also a beautiful park within a 5-minute walk with a 1/4 mile track and a dog run.

The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as December 7, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, and Paper Source. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar or Coco Blue Spruce. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, and The Continental Mid-town. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Alchemy, and Elixr. Have a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in French ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery or pick up a turkey club at Marathon on the Square. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum or Barnes Foundation. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9 to 2. title: Call this 3-bedroom, 1-bath Bella Vista gem home!
description:
Call this 3-bedroom, 1-bath Bella Vista gem home! Blending vintage original details with a recent renovation and upgrades throughout, this home is on a quiet, postcard-perfect block that is just steps away from some of the city's best offerings. The first floor features two rooms that can be used interchangeably as either living or dining rooms depending on your preference, followed by a separate eat-in kitchen with enough space for a breakfast table. With Carrara marble floors and detailing, stainless steel appliances, a durable quartz countertop, and a decorative iron-lattice window, this kitchen is both spacious and well-appointed. Stairs lead up to the second floor where a roomy guest bedroom with its own closet, a renovated bathroom, and an extra open space that easily be used as an office, playroom, or den, with a convenient linen closet await. The large master bedroom with closet and a charming second guest bedroom top off the property on the third floor. Remote controlled ceiling fans and mid-century-style fixtures in the 3 bedrooms and living spaces add smart, efficient flare paired with contemporary hardware and original inlaid floors. Washer and dryer are provided in the unfinished basement, which also has plenty of room for storage. Four AC units are also provided for the renter's convenience. This residential family-friendly block is convenient to schools, as well as Whole Foods and Acme supermarkets, the 9th Street Market, and South Street. Saloon Restaurant and brunch favorite Fitzwater Cafe are right around the corner, as is John's Water Ice, Fiorella, Nomad Pizza, The Good King, Rally Coffee Shop, and so many more places to explore.
708 Clymer St

title: Renovated Town House Near Penn, Septa. Pet friendly.
description:
Welcome to this beautiful cozy townhome with old world charm and character at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great two-bedroom property with complete privacy right in the middle of the city.
This house has original heart of pine wooden floors and features a spiral staircase. Exposed brick accent wall in the living room with plenty of natural light. Brand new bathroom and renovated kitchen. Built in washer and dryer unit on the first floor and plenty of storage in the basement.
Spacious brick back patio with a large Magnolia tree that gives this back yard shade and privacy in the summer.
This house is pet friendly.
The house is only two blocks from the market street El, which gives easy access to Center City and elsewhere. Easy walking distance to University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Clark Park, playgrounds, shopping and grocery stores. Additionally, there are multiple dining and entertainment options within walking distance. Major highways and access to center city and the airport is just minutes away.
Phone interviews first before touring.
For the safety of everyone, mask must be warn when touring the property and hand sanitizer.
Background checks are done with National Tenant Network for all candidates. There is a security deposit and background check fee.
Lease ends August 30, 2023.

title: End Townhouse 3BR/2 w/Hardwoods/Vinyl Floors/Carport, Washer-Dryer!
description: Hurry and Come see this Spacious, 1,520 square foot, End Townhouse with the feel of a Twin. First step into a Bright entry way with sidelight windows and decorative wrought iron railings before you ascend into the voluminous Living Room. The Living Room features triple centered windows that allow for plenty of natural lighting, a ceiling fan and beautifully, refinished, medium toned, hardwood floors. These floors are repeated THROUGH OUT the home including the sleeping quarters. They are very desirable to those who suffer from Asthma and Allergies. Steps away is a formal dining room that echo's the living room and is adjacent to the kitchen. The broad style kitchen has plenty of cabinetry, vinyl flooring for easy cleaning and a separate area to sit and enjoy meals. On the upper level, the Primary bedroom is enormous and has two large walk in closets, a ceiling fan and a Full bathroom with sky light and Shower Stall. The second bedroom is very large and the 3rd bedroom is a good size as well. Both bedrooms have ceiling fans and ample closet space for your needs. Bedrooms are located down the hall from the 3 piece ceramic tiled Hall Bathroom. The Lower level features a spacious Entertainment room. It is grand and has wall to wall carpet, Sliding glass doors to access the rear patio and a large wrap around back yard. It also allows access to a Laundry Room, the Utility Room, a One car garage and Both exterior driveways. This home is located in Toby Farms, is close to area schools and is a great choice if you are looking for a lot of space. First Month and a Security deposit is mandatory. Credit score of 550 or higher, monthly NET income of 3 times the monthly rent and No Evictions are a few requirements. Schedule your appointment today. CONTACT US:  show contact info
